description:
Find it at Best Buy currently for $549 - https://lon.tv/5jh1f (compensated affiliate link) - Lenovo's 16" Yoga 7 is a decent back to school laptop especially at its sale price. See more laptops: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItLi4_4nwCJ89-aXdkVtrL5 , see my latest videos: http://lon.tv/latest and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
